DOC.brief_summary: The purpose current randomize clinical trial compare effectiveness myofascial soft tissue release versus mobilization impulse technique torsion ( anterior ) pain , disability , kinesiophobia individual chronic non-specific low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Myofascial Release Mobilization With Impulse Technique Torsion Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Randomized Clinical Trial . Objective : determine effect myofascial soft tissue release versus mobilization impulse technique torsion ( anterior ) pain , disability kinesiophobia individual chronic non-specific low back pain . Methods Measures : sixty-four individual randomly assign one two group . Intervention : For 12-week , group 1 undergo treatment comprise myofascial soft tissue release protocol ( 1/week ) group 2 receive mobilization impulse technique torsion ( anterior ) ( 1/week ) . Main Outcome Measures : Intensity pain , disability , fear movement , isometric endurance trunk flexor muscle lumbar mobility flexion data collect baseline , 24hr last manual therapy application . Mixed-model analysis variance use examine effect treatment outcome measure .
DOC.criteria: Score ≥4 Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire Inability achieve lumbar muscle flexionrelaxation trunk flexion Low back pain ≥3 month Not undergo another physical therapy treatment Disease central peripheral nervous system Having previously undergone spinal manipulative therapy Contraindication low back thrust manipulation A history spinal surgery Treatment corticosteroid past two week Clinical sign radiculopathy Presence lumbar stenosis Diagnosis spondylolisthesis
